import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Card, CardBody, ListGroupItem, FormGroup, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, CardHeader, Col, Pagination, PaginationItem, PaginationLink, Row, Table, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import CustomModal from '../../../containers/Components/Modal' import Validation from '../../../containers/Validation' class Cart extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } render() { let {items} = this.props return (
Cart {/* {this.state.success ? {this.state.success} : ''} */} {items.map(item => { return ( ) })}
Item Name Item Price quantity Total Price
{item.price} {item.quantity} {item.price*item.quantity}
{/* {this.state.validation.message('name_en')} English Name (this.inputNode = node)} defaultValue={name_en} autoComplete="name" /> {this.state.validation.message('name_ar')} Arabic Name (this.inputNode = node)} defaultValue={name_ar} autoComplete="name" /> */}
); } } export default Items;
